description: The file is an HTML webpage implementing a user interface for visualizing database contents, including features like database and table selection, data display, and dynamic content loading via JavaScript.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches the list of available databases and displays them in the sidebar.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the list of databases, resetting current selections.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Handles expanding or collapsing database entries to show tables.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Fetches and displays the list of tables for a selected database.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Fetches and renders data for a selected table.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Builds and inserts an HTML table with data into the container.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Generates individual table cell HTML, handling different data types and truncation.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Enables expansion or collapsing of cell content for long text or objects.
